name: Assign-module2soln.GitHub.io
body:
_Hi people!!_


Due to some reasons, I am not able to publish the soln. page directly here as u may be expecting. Please click on "view it on Github" and from there view the code and review it. Its working Just as the assign. tells us to do but I am unable to put it here on preview. In order to it please zip it on ur system and run it to see the content and check whether its up to mark or not!! Please give this project some of ur time to review it to fullest!


Thanks! :-)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
